greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of (Sum_{n=-inf..inf} x^(n^2))^(-5).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: G.f.: 1/theta_3(x)^5, where theta_3() is the Jacobi theta function.
mathematica: nmax = 30; CoefficientList[Series[Product[((1 + (-x)^k)/(1 - (-x)^k))^5, {k, 1, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 18 2015 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
